get.description: List the operations for the provider

get.description: Lists all of the legacy peerings under the given subscription matching the specified kind and location.

parameters.name: asn
parameters.description: The ASN number associated with a legacy peering.

parameters.name: command
parameters.description: The command to be executed: ping, traceroute, bgpRoute.

parameters.name: sourceType
parameters.description: The type of the source: Edge site or Azure Region.

parameters.name: destinationIP
parameters.description: The IP address of the destination.

get.description: Lists all of the peer ASNs under the given subscription.
Gets the peer ASN with the specified name under the given subscription.

put.description: Creates a new peer ASN or updates an existing peer ASN with the specified name under the given subscription.

delete.description: Deletes an existing peer ASN with the specified name under the given subscription.

get.description: Lists all of the available peering locations for the specified kind of peering.
Lists all of the available countries for peering service.
Lists all of the available locations for peering service.

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: The country of interest, in which the locations are to be present.

get.description: Lists all of the available peering service locations for the specified kind of peering.
Lists all of the peerings under the given subscription.
Lists all of the peerings under the given subscription.

Gets an existing peering service with the specified name under the given subscription and resource group.

put.description: Creates a new peering service or updates an existing peering with the specified name under the given subscription and resource group.

parameters.name: peeringService
parameters.description: The properties needed to create or update a peering service.

patch.description: Updates tags for a peering service with the specified name under the given subscription and resource group.

delete.description: Deletes an existing peering service with the specified name under the given subscription and resource group.

parameters.name: connectionMonitorTestName

get.description: Lists the prefixes received over the specified peering under the given subscription and resource group.

parameters.description: The optional AS path that can be used to filter the routes.

parameters.description: The optional RPKI validation state that can be used to filter the routes.

parameters.name: $skipToken
parameters.description: The optional page continuation token that is used in the event of paginated result.

ConnectivityProbe.description:
Represents a connectivity probe, a configuration peers can add to direct and exchange peerings to create ping tests. These ping
tests will allow us to generate availability, jitter, and latency data for traffic (using ICMP or TCP) from Azure to an endpoint
IP address given by the customer. This data will be emitted such that the peer can view these metrics in the Azure portal in the
Connectivity probe blade of their peering.

endpoint.description: The endpoint IP address where traffic will be sent to from Azure for the connectivity probe.

azureRegion.description: The Azure region where traffic will originate from for the connectivity probe.

protocol.description: The protocol of the traffic that will be sent for the connectivity probe.

prefixesToAccesslist.description:
Set to contain the prefixes that agents in Azure will send traffic from. For peers to allow into their
network the connectivity probe traffic can reach their endpoint for the connectivity probe.

email.description: The e-mail address of the contact.

phone.description: The phone number of the contact.

provisionedBandwidthInMbps.description: The bandwidth that is actually provisioned.

sessionAddressProvider.description: The field indicating if Microsoft provides session ip addresses.

useForPeeringService.description: The flag that indicates whether or not the connection is used for peering service.

microsoftTrackingId.description: The ID used within Microsoft's peering provisioning system to track the connection

peeringDBFacilityId.description: The PeeringDB.com ID of the facility at which the connection has to be set up.

bgpSession.description: The BGP session associated with the connection.

connectionIdentifier.description: The unique identifier (GUID) for the connection.

errorMessage.description: The error message related to the connection state, if any.
